text: Bɨ olap pen yad God bɨ suŋtep ne mɨdenɨm agɨl gos nɨgup ak, anɨgɨnɨmuŋ. Ne wog kɨles tɨmel yɨbɨl gɨtep gin agɨl ma gonɨmuŋ. Mel. Ne pen God nop gos lɨnɨŋɨd, gos anɨgɨl nɨgɨnɨmuŋ, God binɨb tap si tap tɨmel gɨpal okok nɨŋɨd kɨlop gek, God binɨb suŋtep ne yenɨgabal. Bɨ anɨb ak God nop gos lɨnɨgup ak, nop nɨŋɨd gek, God bɨ suŋtep ne mɨdeb.
